article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YeaVCS hentry entry story-marquee-standard

header.div: NOW YOU'LL NEVER GET TO THE GREAT WALL

h2.a: If You're A Foreigner Using GPS In China, You Could Be A 'Spy'

div.p: China's sensitivities are so strong that it is technically illegal for a foreigner to operate a GPS device in China.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YeaVCS&via=Digg&text=If You're A Foreigner Using GPS In China, You Could Be A 'Spy'

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XaAPal hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Food Truck Economics

div.p: As a service that strips all the overhead costs of a restaurant down to the minimum requirements for selling food to customers, food trucks are also an irresistible metaphor for lean startups.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XaAPal&via=Digg&text=Food Truck Economics

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10NNZNi hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Samsung Has A Runaway Train In Galaxy S4

div.p: There's so much momentum behind the Galaxy S franchise that Samsung could have put out nearly anything and have a hit on its hands.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10NNZNi&via=Digg&text=Samsung Has A Runaway Train In Galaxy S4

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZL4GI7 hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: We're Building A Reader

div.p: We’ve been planning to build a reader in the second half of 2013, one that, like Digg, makes the Internet a more approachable and digestible place. After Google’s announcement, we’re moving the project to the top of our priority list. We’re going to build a reader, starting today.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZL4GI7&via=Digg&text=We're Building A Reader

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-WowKC9 hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Our Water Supply Is Laced With Prescription Drugs

div.p: Americans take so many mood-altering and addictive pills that water supplies are being contaminated. Just ask the fish. Do the drugs in your water pose a risk to your health?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WowKC9&via=Digg&text=Our Water Supply Is Laced With Prescription Drugs

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YtAims hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: AND YOU THOUGHT PIGEONS WERE CREEPY

h2.a: The Earliest Birds May Have Had Four Wings

div.p: Before birds could fly on two wings, they had to ditch their training wings. This idea, first put forward a decade ago, is gaining credence with the discovery of 11 early bird fossils that seem to suggest that birds – which evolved from feathered dinosaurs – once had four wings.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YtAims&via=Digg&text=The Earliest Birds May Have Had Four Wings

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZKoMCm hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Did Venezuela's Chavez Nudge Christ To Pick South American Pope?

div.p: Late Venezuelan leader Hugo Chavez's influence may have stretched into the afterlife and had a hand in Christ's decision to opt for a Latin American Pope, acting President Nicolas Maduro said on Wednesday.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZKoMCm&via=Digg&text=Did Venezuela's Chavez Nudge Christ To Pick South American Pope?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZqCYR2 hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Restaurant Horror Show: How Waitstaffs Are Mistreated

div.p: Almost 10 percent of the U.S. workforce is in the restaurant industry. Why is it legal to treat them so poorly?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZqCYR2&via=Digg&text=Restaurant Horror Show: How Waitstaffs Are Mistreated

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-13YtORB hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Brain Scan Knows Who You're Thinking About

div.p: For the first time, scientists can scan a person’s brain and deduce whom a person is thinking of. With further research, such a technique could help diagnose and treat autism and other social interaction disorders.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13YtORB&via=Digg&text=Brain Scan Knows Who You're Thinking About

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Z7aLiR hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: How Facebook's Graph Search Knows What You Want

div.p: While Bing and Google mine the Web for information about the pronouns of Earth—"entities" such as individuals, products, locations, and concepts—Facebook is instead tapping into the collective knowledge of one billion users to answer questions about where to eat, what to buy, and who to ask for advice.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Z7aLiR&via=Digg&text=How Facebook's Graph Search Knows What You Want

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZCyPrN hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: The Mannequin Cosmonaut Ivan Ivanovich

div.p: Leading up to Yuri Gagarin's historic Vostok 1 flight, the Soviet Union launched two missions with a man-like mannequin, Ivan Ivanovich, on board.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZCyPrN&via=Digg&text=The Mannequin Cosmonaut Ivan Ivanovich

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-16uWJfk hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: How To Make $10 Million On YouTube

div.p: In the same month that Ian Hecox and Anthony Padilla's YouTube channel Smosh passed Ray William Johnson's to become the most popular channel on YouTube, Forbes estimated the brand brought in $10 million in revenue the previous year. Here's how they did it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/16uWJfk&via=Digg&text=How To Make $10 Million On YouTube

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-13YgZGJ hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: YOUR MILK WON'T LAST THAT LONG

h2.a: Einstein's Design For A Fridge To Last 100 Years

div.p: After establishing the theory of relativity as a founding principle of modern physics, Albert Einstein turned his thoughts to higher matters: home appliances.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13YgZGJ&via=Digg&text=Einstein's Design For A Fridge To Last 100 Years

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YuxmD3 hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: 'Parallel Universe' Of Life Described Far Beneath The Bottom Of The Sea

div.p: Deep beneath the ocean floor off the Pacific Northwest coast, scientists have described the existence of a potentially vast realm of life, one almost completely disconnected from the world above.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YuxmD3&via=Digg&text='Parallel Universe' Of Life Described Far Beneath The Bottom Of The Sea

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10FhvVe hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Almost A Quarter Of US Teens Mainly Use Their Smartphones To Go Online

div.p: Teen reaction: "Duh."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10FhvVe&via=Digg&text=Almost A Quarter Of US Teens Mainly Use Their Smartphones To Go Online

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZJhFKa hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Google’s Superfast Internet Experiment Will Be Slow to Spread

div.p: Google Fiber could bring superfast Internet to every town in America, but for now the company is thinking small

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZJhFKa&via=Digg&text=Google’s Superfast Internet Experiment Will Be Slow to Spread

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10SYcvK hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Why Celebs Leak Their Own Texts

div.p: Before social media, stars had to use tabloid editors and gossip reporters to broker the revelation of private correspondence. Now stars can build stories about their foes’ offenses on their own, complete with evidence.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10SYcvK&via=Digg&text=Why Celebs Leak Their Own Texts

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Wnkamy hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: AND YOU PROBABLY CAN'T AFFORD ONE

h2.a: You Have Lost The Right To An Attorney

div.p: You have a right to an attorney in a criminal case, even if you cannot afford one. The Supreme Court said so half a century ago. But today that precious right is systematically ignored or undermined.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Wnkamy&via=Digg&text=You Have Lost The Right To An Attorney

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10KVqow hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: The Mechanics Of The Pull-Up (And Why Women Can Absolutely Do Them)

div.p: You can do yoga all day, you can run or bike or swim, but a pull-up will still be hard. It’s not that you have to be a juiced-up “lunk” to do one; it’s a matter of physics.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10KVqow&via=Digg&text=The Mechanics Of The Pull-Up (And Why Women Can Absolutely Do Them)

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-16v08KZ hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: A Higgs Boson Has Been Found

div.p: Evidence indicates that the new particle discovered at the Large Hadron Collider is a Higgs boson, officials at the European Organization for Nuclear Research, also known as CERN, said Thursday.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/16v08KZ&via=Digg&text=A Higgs Boson Has Been Found

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-14AsEr5 hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Gum With As Much Caffeine As Coffee

div.p: For those tired of getting their energy boosts in liquid form, Wrigley has a proposition to chew on: caffeinated gum.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/14AsEr5&via=Digg&text=Gum With As Much Caffeine As Coffee

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZDbYwd hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Notable Social Media Editor Indicted For Allegedly Conspiring With Anonymous

div.p: Matthew Keys, one of Reuters News' top social media managers, is facing potentially serious prison time after federal accusations that he's a member of Anonymous. According to the DOJ, Keys tried to help hackers deface Tribune Company news sites.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZDbYwd&via=Digg&text=Notable Social Media Editor Indicted For Allegedly Conspiring With Anonymous

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10MOBmd hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Facebook Is Working To Incorporate The Hashtag

div.p: Facebook is getting ready to take on a symbol of rival Twitter: the hashtag.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10MOBmd&via=Digg&text=Facebook Is Working To Incorporate The Hashtag

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZCEUV6 hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Google Reader’s Demise Is Awful For Iranians

div.p: Google’s announcement that it’s killing off Google Reader was met with outrage from journalists who rely on it to efficiently churn through websites. But the real tragedy is likely to be felt in countries like Iran, where Google Reader is used to evade government censorship.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZCEUV6&via=Digg&text=Google Reader’s Demise Is Awful For Iranians

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-WoQPZ1 hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Source: Newtown Shooter Studied Previous Mass Killings

div.p: State Police investigators have reportedly discovered reams of documents related to "virtually every mass murder" in the United States and abroad, according to a source.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WoQPZ1&via=Digg&text=Source: Newtown Shooter Studied Previous Mass Killings

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-15OXe2A hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: The Return Of The Popped Collar

div.p: Collars are popping. Everywhere. Why is the fashion industry suddenly styling our clothes like it's 1984 all over again?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/15OXe2A&via=Digg&text=The Return Of The Popped Collar

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-WqpYvD hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: In Honor Of Passover, JDate Made Moses An Online Dating Profile

div.p: Nothing like a major religious holiday to remind you if you don’t find a mate pronto you’ll never hear the end of it! Hence JDate is releasing their very own digital edition of the Haggadah, the traditional guide to the Passover Seder.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WqpYvD&via=Digg&text=In Honor Of Passover, JDate Made Moses An Online Dating Profile

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-IZyoyJ hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: SHE'S PROBABLY READ MORE THAN YOU HAVE

h2.a: A List Of The Books In Marilyn Monroe’s Personal Library

div.p: This woman loved to read.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/IZyoyJ&via=Digg&text=A List Of The Books In Marilyn Monroe’s Personal Library

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-16uwvte hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: The Last Shot

div.p: Earl Badu hit one of the most famous shots in Maryland basketball history. Ten years later, he jumped off a bridge.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/16uwvte&via=Digg&text=The Last Shot

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-13WUuCb hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: A Guide To Buying Any Illegal Drug You Want

div.p: Here's a walkthrough on how to use Silk Road to buy everything from drugs to assassins.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13WUuCb&via=Digg&text=A Guide To Buying Any Illegal Drug You Want

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YbGn7M hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: 'His Horse Was Named Death'

div.p: Ten years after the invasion of Iraq, Tim McLaughlin's remarkable diary of the war reveals a personal, untold history of America's fraught adventure in the Middle East.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YbGn7M&via=Digg&text='His Horse Was Named Death'
